All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AbstractController
Super abstract class for all controllers All the controllers inherit from this class and the method start
AbstractOrderController
AbstractOrderController is a class for the order process its added event handler to the stage, the event restart the timer when mouse move.
ApproveCustomersController
ApproveCustomersController is a controller class used for approve or disapprove new customers.
CartCell
CartCell is a controller class for an order cart view.
CartCellController
CartCellController class is the controller class for the CartCell FXML file.
CatalogCell
CatalogCell is a controller class for item in the catalog.
CatlogCellController
CatalogCellController class is the controller class for the CatalogCell FXML file.
ChooseReportController
ChooseReportController handles the user's choice of report type.
ClientApp
ClientApp class is starting the EKrut app.
ClientBackEnd
ClientBackEnd class serves as back end manager for client side in the program.
Config
Config is a utility class used for configuration of app set up.
ConnectionController
ConnectionController handles the connection between client and server.
CreateCustomerController
The CreateCustomerController class is a controller class for the "Create Customer" feature in a JavaFX application.
CreateResupplyRequestController
CreateResupplyRequestController class is a controller that interacts with the region manager's resupply request panel.
CustomerDeliveriesController
CustomerDeliveriesController is a controller class for a customer delivery orders.
CustomerPanelController
CustomerPanelController is the main controller for costumer panel.
CustomerReport
CustomerReport represent a customer report
CustomerReportController
CustomerReportController is the controller for handling customer reports.
CustomerServiceController
CustomerServiceController is a controller class for the customer service employee.
DBController
DBController class used to connect to a mysql DB and perform actions related to the DB.
DeliveryOperatorController
DeliveryOperatorController is a controller class for Main Delivery Operator panel for FXML file: DeliveryOperatorPanel.fxml It has one method "moveToForm" that will move to Delivery Orders Form screen that method connected to 'deliveryBtn' button Methods "back" and "setUp" are not implemented (extends AbstractController)
DeliveryOrdersController
DeliveryOrdersController is a controller class for Order Deliveries Screen for FXML file: DeliveryOrdersForm.fxml It has FXML attributes for Buttons, Labels, TextFields, TableColumn and TableView It has HashMap "dataMap" that store each OrderID (askey) and the order data (as value) It has ObservableList that stores deliveries data at each new mysql 'SELECT' action It has 3 final integer attributes for calculation of estimated delivery date and time Method "setUp" is not implemented (extends AbstractController)
EditUserController
The EditUserController class is responsible for handling user input and updating user data in the database.
LoginController
 
ManageInventoryController
ManageInventoryController is a controller class for the operation employee inventory managing.
MarketingEmployeeController
MarketingEmployeeController is the main controller class for marketing employee.
MarketingManagerController
MarketingManagerController is the main controller class for marketing manager.
MinimalStoreProduct
MinimalStoreProduct class represents a basic product in a store, includes a Product's name and quantity
Msg
 
OperationEmpController
ManageInventoryController is the main controller class for the operation employee.
Order
Order class represents an order (Entity) It has fields for the information of the order.
OrderDetails
The OrderDetails class represents an order placed by a user.
OrderHandler
 
OrderMethodFormController
OrderMethodFormController is a controller for order methods: pick up / delivery.
OrderProduct
OrderProduct represent a product in an order, it contains productID, product name, price, quant and cartQuantity the difference between quant and cartQuantity, is that quant is the quantity available in the db, and cartQuantity is the quantity in the cart
OrderReport
OrderReport class represents a report of orders according to a store(Entity) It has fields for the information of that report.
OrderReportController
OrderReportController is the controller for handling orders reports.
OrderReportPanelController
OrderReportPanelController is a controller class for orders report process.
OrderScreenController
This class handles the items picking (Cart) process for an order.
OrderViewCell
OrderViewCell is a controller class for an order list.
OrderViewController
OrderViewController class is the controller class for the OrderViewList FXML file.
PaymentController
This class handles the payment process for an order.
PickupFormController
PickupFormController is the controller for handling orders of method: pick up.
Product
Product class represents a product in the system (Entity) It has fields for the information of a product.
Region
Region class represents a region in the system (Entity) It has fields for the information of a region.
RegionManagerMainScreenController
RegionManagerMainScreenController is the main controller for region manager.
ReportGenerator
ReportGenerator class used to generates reports for stock status and orders for all stores (except Warhouse) It runs monthly from first day of a month.
ResupplyProduct
 
ResupplyReqController
ResupplyReqController is a controller for operation employee.
ResupplyRequest
ResupplyRequest class represents a resupply request of store product inventory
RunningSaleController
RunningSaleController is the controller for handling running sales.
SaleInitiateFormController
A controller class for a JavaFX application that allows marketing managers to initiate sales.
SaleTemplateCreationController
A controller class for a JavaFX application that allows marketing managers to create sale templates.
ServerApp
ServerApp class is starting the server app.
serverBackEnd
serverBackEnd class used for managing the connections in the system and handling/sending messages from/to clients.
ServerController
ServerController class is the main controller class for the ServerApp.
StockReport
StockReport class represents a stock report of a store (Entity) It has fields for the information stock report of a store.
StockStatusReportController
StockStatusReportController is the controller for handling stock status reports.
Store
Store class represents a store in system (Entity) It has fields for the information of the store.
StoreProduct
StoreProduct class represents the products in each store (Entity) It has fields for the information each product in a store.
TableOrders
TableOrders class represents a delivery order (Entity) It has fields for the information of the order.
Tasker
Tasker class used to manage the different tasks in the system.
Tasks
Enum file representing the tasks our project perform.
UpdateMinLimitController
UpdateMinLimitController is the controller for handling minimum limit of products.
User
User class represents a user in the system.
UserManager
UserManager is a class that manages the connected clients on server.
UserPanelController
UserPanelController is the main controller class for the User Panel.
